name: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
description: Requires D:OS2 files from GOG for setup.
notes: After installing the game, you can install the DLC (Sir Iora the Squirrel Companion) by first downloading it and then executing it in the wine prefix (right click on Divinity: Original Sin 2 in Lutris and click on "Run EXE inside Wine prefix" and select the DLC installer.

files.setup: N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Divinity - Original Sin 2/DefEd/bin/EoCApp.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native
